entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
